languages.text: Чем дольше длился разговор, тем хуже выглядел хормейстер Вайс. Наконец, рухнув на пол, он повелел слугам унести его на корабль. По его словам, разум захваченного варпом астропата был слишком изъязвлен жуткими образами Имматериума, и вглядываться в эту бездну кошмара было слишком опасно.

The longer the conversation went on, the worse Master Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would have been too dangerous.
languages.original_text: Чем дольше длился разговор, тем хуже выглядел хормейстер Вайс. Наконец, рухнув на пол, он повелел слугам унести его на корабль. По его словам, разум захваченного варпом астропата был слишком изъязвлен жуткими образами Имматериума, и вглядываться в эту бездну кошмара было слишком опасно.

traits.locale_text: The longer the conversation went on, the worse Choirmaster Weisz was looking, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would've been too dangerous.

The longer the conversation went on, the worse Choirmaster Weisz was looking, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would've been too dangerous.

The longer the conversation went on, the worse Choirmaster Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would've been too dangerous.

The longer the conversation went on, the worse Choirmaster Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would've been too dangerous.

The longer the conversation went on, the worse Master Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would have been too dangerous.

The longer the conversation went on, the worse Master Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would have been too dangerous.

languages.text: Cuanto más se alargaba la conversación, peor aspecto presentaba el maestro Weisz, hasta que colapsó en el suelo y ordenó a sus sirvientes devolverlo a la nave. Según asegura, la mente del Astrópata atrapado en la disformidad estaba tan dañada por las imágenes horribles del Inmaterio que habría sido casi un suicidio observar ese abismo de pesadilla.
languages.original_text: The longer the conversation went on, the worse Master Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would have been too dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Cuanto más se alargaba la conversación, peor aspecto presentaba el maestro Weisz, hasta que colapsó en el suelo y ordenó a sus sirvientes devolverlo a la nave. Según asegura, la mente del Astrópata atrapado en la disformidad estaba tan dañada por las imágenes horribles del Inmaterio que habría sido casi un suicidio observar ese abismo de pesadilla.

languages.text: 会話が長くなるに連れて、マスター・ワイズの顔色は悪くなり、ついには床に倒れこんでしまう。彼は従者に自分を船まで運ぶよう命じた。ワイズの話では、<歪み>に囚われた感応通信官の精神は、非物質世界の恐ろしいイメージに苦しめられていて、あの悪夢のような深淵を覗き込むのは危険すぎるのだという。
languages.original_text: The longer the conversation went on, the worse Master Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would have been too dangerous.

traits.locale_text: 会話が長くなるに連れて、マスター・ワイズの顔色は悪くなり、ついには床に倒れこんでしまう。彼は従者に自分を船まで運ぶよう命じた。ワイズの話では、<歪み>に囚われた感応通信官の精神は、非物質世界の恐ろしいイメージに苦しめられていて、あの悪夢のような深淵を覗き込むのは危険すぎるのだという。

languages.text: 双方交流得越久，威茨大师的脸色就变得越是惨白。到最后，他瘫倒在地，命令仆人们把他抬回船上。据他声称，那个迷失在亚空间的星语者心智遭到了严重的扭曲，意识中充满了亚空间恐怖的景象，光是窥视那个噩梦般的深渊，就是件极其危险的事情。
languages.original_text: The longer the conversation went on, the worse Master Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would have been too dangerous.

traits.locale_text: 双方交流得越久，威茨大师的脸色就变得越是惨白。到最后，他瘫倒在地，命令仆人们把他抬回船上。据他声称，那个迷失在亚空间的星语者心智遭到了严重的扭曲，意识中充满了亚空间恐怖的景象，光是窥视那个噩梦般的深渊，就是件极其危险的事情。

languages.text: Je länger das Gespräch dauerte, desto schlechter sah Meister Weisz aus, bis er schließlich auf dem Boden zusammenbrach und Dienern befahl, ihn zurück auf das Schiff zu tragen. Laut seiner Aussage war der Verstand des vom Warp gefangenen Astropathen derart durchzogen von den grauenhaften Bildern des Immateriums, dass es zu gefährlich gewesen wäre, in diesen albtraumhaften Abgrund zu blicken.
languages.original_text: The longer the conversation went on, the worse Master Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would have been too dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Je länger das Gespräch dauerte, desto schlechter sah Meister Weisz aus, bis er schließlich auf dem Boden zusammenbrach und Dienern befahl, ihn zurück auf das Schiff zu tragen. Laut seiner Aussage war der Verstand des vom Warp gefangenen Astropathen derart durchzogen von den grauenhaften Bildern des Immateriums, dass es zu gefährlich gewesen wäre, in diesen albtraumhaften Abgrund zu blicken.

languages.text: Plus la conversation se prolonge, plus maître Weisz a l'air mal en point, mais il faudra qu'il s'effondre pour qu'il se décide enfin à ordonner à ses serviteurs de le porter jusqu'à son vaisseau. Selon lui, l'esprit de l'astropathe capturé par le Warp est tellement meurtri par la vision de l'Immaterium qu'il serait bien trop dangereux de regarder dans cet abîme cauchemardesque.
languages.original_text: The longer the conversation went on, the worse Master Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would have been too dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Plus la conversation se prolonge, plus maître Weisz a l'air mal en point, mais il faudra qu'il s'effondre pour qu'il se décide enfin à ordonner à ses serviteurs de le porter jusqu'à son vaisseau. Selon lui, l'esprit de l'astropathe capturé par le Warp est tellement meurtri par la vision de l'Immaterium qu'il serait bien trop dangereux de regarder dans cet abîme cauchemardesque.

languages.text: Diyalog uzadıkça Üstat Weisz daha da kötü görünmeye başladı. En nihayetinde yere çökerek hizmetkârlara kendisini gemiye taşımalarını emretti. Anlattıklarına göre öteboyuta yakalanan Astropatın zihni, Tindiyar'ın dehşete düşüren görüntüleriyle öylesine zedelenmişti ki âdeta kâbuslardan fırlamış o uçuruma bakmak bile çok tehlikeliydi.
languages.original_text: The longer the conversation went on, the worse Master Weisz looked, until he collapsed on the floor and ordered servants to carry him back to the ship. According to him, the mind of the warp-captured Astropath was so lacerated with the Immaterium's horrifying imagery that peering into that nightmarish abyss would have been too dangerous.
